hook.text: You haven't updated your LinkedIn in two years. Your last blog post was in 2022. Your brand is decaying.

buildup.text: Like technical debt, brand debt accumulates when you stop investing in your professional presence.

discovery.text: Stale profiles signal disengagement. Outdated content misrepresents your current capabilities.

twist.text: Brand debt compounds. The longer you wait, the bigger the gap between perception and reality.

climax.text: Schedule quarterly brand maintenance: update profiles, publish one piece, and refresh your story.

punchline.text: A brand unused is a brand you'll have to rebuild.

quiz.question: What is personal brand debt?
options: Accumulated decay from not investing in your professional presence
